<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Illusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=2071) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 192 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Shadowdancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=77), [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
[Shadow Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2069)

</column>

---

With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms. You gain the [_shadow illusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=663) focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1. You become an expert in occult spell attack rolls and DCs.
